item.title: Microsoft Purview Data Risk Assessments: M365 vs Fabric
item.description:
Why Data Risk Assessments matter more in the AI era: Generative AI changes the oversharing equation. It can surface data faster, to more people, with less friction, which means existing permission mistakes become more visible, more quickly. Microsoft Purview Data Risk Assessments are designed to identify and help you remediate oversharing risks before (or while) AI experiences like Copilot and analytics copilots accelerate access patterns.
